plugin_manifest.name: Moderators for Roles
plugin_manifest.author: András Szepesházi - Arck Interactive, LLC
plugin_manifest.blurb: Implements the Moderator role via the Roles framework
plugin_manifest.description: Adds more granular access to your site by introducing Moderators. Moderators can edit other users' content and view reported content, but can't access other admin features.
